page.title: 08INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: {..Interesting People Continued.. How did you come to be here?{Well,I {was in domestic service in Leominster, {my sister & her husband moved to {Newbold Pacey, the man there was Mr. {....., and he was a bit eratic. He {used to go in for pigs and paint them {in stripes!....I came up here in the {first year of the war to be with {Molly,I got the job as cook at {Wolverton Grange.Then I got married & {we went to live at the end of White {House Farm-and that was that.I shall {be 82 in August...Molly is 11 yrs. {younger,yet you have moved in to look {after her..Yes we've always been {close.Bert my husband used to work at {the Red Horse Inn.He used to see me {into bed first & go up at 10.15p.m. {of course it'd be 1 o'clock before {he'd come home.He went to work next {morning on beer or cold tea.
